vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
Demo.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.call(id,from,to[i],value[i])) (patch_11.sol#13)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_11.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (patch_11.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Demo.transfer (patch_11.sol#4-16):
	-require(bool)(tokenContract.call(id,from,to[i],value[i])) patch_11.sol#13
